Equations $R_1$ and $R_2$ form a system. Our goal is to show that a second system ($R_1$ and $R_3$) form a system with the same solutions.

$\quad$$R_1$$~~~\rightarrow~~~$$ x + y = 5$  
$\quad$$R_2$$~~~\rightarrow~~~$$ x - y = 1$  
$\quad$$R_3$$~~~\rightarrow~~~$$\underline{\begin{align}R_1\\+2\cdot R_2\end{align}}$  
$~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~$[[☃ expression 1]]

**What is $R_3$? Write your equation in terms of $x$ and $y$.**
